artist: Artist: Joel Janowitz; Printer: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis; Publisher: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis
creditline: Highpoint Editions Archive, The Friends of Bruce B. Dayton Acquisition Fund and the Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
description: Monoprint combining five colors bleed printed lithographically using split­fount inking from three plates on Okawara paper and monotyping by the artist. The print was then adhered to the Arches Cover backing sheet. Being a variant edition, the prints were signed with Roman numerals I/XII -XII/XII.
image_copyright: Copyright © Joel Janowitz%2C published by Highpoint Editions
markings: LL in pencil below image: VII/XII | Publisher\'s blindstamp, LL below image: HP
medium: Color lithograph and monotype, with chine collé on Arches Cover paper
provenance: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis (publisher); sold to MIA, 2020.
signed: LR in pencil below image: Janowitz 2005 | BC in pencil below image: SCROLL
title: Scroll (VII)
